title: Sri Lankan Rupee depreciates further against USD
body_lines: Sri Lankan Rupee depreciated further against the US Dollar, hitting a record low today (April 08).
According to Central Bank’s official exchange rates for the day, the selling rate of a US Dollar now stands at Rs. 321.49.
On Tuesday (April 05), the official selling rate of US Dollar exceeded Rs. 300 mark for the first time in Sri Lankan history.
